message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take $6000, you take $4000.  We can avoid letting inflation eat away at our potential gains.
I think we can both do better.  I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I need a bit more for myself. Let's make this fair!
Bob, time is money, literally! My turn to propose a fairer split. I'll take $5500, leaving you with $4500. Let's settle this before inflation shrinks our shares further!
